entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is described as a mischievous entity who appears floating cross-legged in the air, clutching walking sticks. He has an evil cackle and enjoys causing trouble.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as a prefect who tries to control Peeves and warns his friends about him. He is also the one who gives the password to the portrait.

entities.name: nevile
entities.description: Neville is described as someone who needs help getting through the round hole in the wall.

relationships.description: Percy tries to control Peeves, but Peeves won't listen to him.
Peeves harasses Neville by dropping walking sticks on his head and zooming away.
